    public class IOLibrary
extends Library

      • text_from_file_2

        public boolean text_from_file_2(Term file_name,
                                Term text)
                         throws PrologError
        reads a source text from a file.

        It's useful used with agent predicate: text_from_file(File,Source), agent(Source).

        Throws:
        PrologError
